answers.question: Telegram Handle We Can Use To Contact You
Link to your Public Group Chat
Have you participated in a previous Gitcoin Grants Round? If so, please name the rounds or link the builder profile associated with previous rounds.

answers.answer: We provide the widget that help any Dapp to be easily interoperable across 60+ blockchains (EVM + non EVM) and 3000+ tokens.
answers.question: How does your project contribute to the growth of the OSS ecosystem? Please provide specific examples of how your application enhances or expands the current ecosystem.

answers.answer: We enable the users to execute cross-chain contract calls where they can easily perform the lending, staking and other custom contract calls without the need for bridging the funds first. This feature differentiates us from the tools currently available because we provide single step-checkout without expecting the users to first bridge funds and then executing contract calls and this also saves a ton of gas fees.
answers.question: What features or use cases does your dApp/App present? How is it differentiated?

answers.answer: We will use the grant funds to further enhance the UX by integrating the fiat gateway so users can interact with the Dapps with their credit card or paypal.
answers.question: What are your plans for further development, and how will the grant funds be used to achieve these goals?

For any project deploying smart contracts on blockchain networks, please list all your deployer addresses and their corresponding blockchain networks. Use this format for each entry: [deployer_address], [chain_id]â€”for example, 0x123abc..., 42161 (This represents a deployer address on the Arbitrum network). Please include a separate line for each unique deployer address and blockchain combination.

project.title: Doogly
project.description:
About Doogly

Doogly (https://doogly.org) is the donation protocol that will be built on top of allo that enables the donor to donate using any token on any of the supported EVM chains while the recipient will get all the funds in USDC in their specified chain. This can be used by any grants program. Once the donation is made donor gets the NFT called Hypercert (https://hypercerts.org) that represents the certificate of impact made by them.

Doogly facilitates the reachability of projects to a wider audience in web3 at the same time making it easier for donors to donate using any token they have.

Problem we are solving

There is no plug-and-play tool which helps the users to accept cross-chain crypto donations
Generally people loose lot of potential donations because tokens that donor have does not match the token recipient want to receive.

How Doogly integrates with and benefits Allo

Doogly is integrating Allo to enable beneficiaries to have the right distribution strategies for collected funds. Together with Allo, Doogly could provide the right tools for donation aggregation for individuals, projects and organizations.

Roadmap 

MVP Development - Done
Developer SDK
Integration with multiple EVM L2 chains - ToDo
Integrations with social platforms (eg. Farcaster)

Resources - 

Website - https://doogly.org
Github - https://github.com/doogly-org
